\w This|strong="H3588"\w* \w thought|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* yours \w is|strong="H4639"\w* perverse: \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* clay \w should|strong="H0518"\w* \w think|strong="H2803"\w* \w against|strong="H2803"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w potter|strong="H3335"\w*, \w and|strong="H0995"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w should|strong="H0518"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w maker|strong="H3335"\w* thereof: Thou madest \w me|strong="H0995"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* framed \w should|strong="H0518"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w fashioned|strong="H3335"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w*: Thou understandest \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.
